songs.title: Dance Until Tomorrow
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
(Oh, Oh! Oh, Oh! Oh, Oh!)
(Oh, Oh! Oh, Oh! Oh, Oh!)

[Verse 2: Joe]
Calling you out, calling you out
So you can see what's going on
Breaking it down, breaking me down
'Cause I can see that something's wrong

[Pre-Chorus: Nick]
Your body's moving
But your mind is somewhere else
And I don't know how to get there
It's like you're losing yourself

[Chorus: Nick]
(Oh, oh)
No, I never thought that we'd come this far
(Oh, oh!)
Got enough for me to break my heart
(Oh, oh)
When the music stops
Promise me that you won't let it go
We'll keep dancing 'till tomorrow

[Verse 2: Joe]
Calling you out, calling you out
'Cause I can see we're near the end
Letting me down, letting me down
It's like we're back to one again

[Pre-Chorus: Nick]
Your body's moving
But your mind is somewhere else
And I don't know how to get there
It's like you're losing yourself

[Chorus: Nick]
(Oh, oh)
No, I never thought we'd come this far
(Oh, oh!)
Got enough for me to break my heart
(Oh, oh)
When the music stops
Promise me that you won't let it go
We'll keep dancing 'til tomorrow

[Bridge: Nick]
(Oh, oh!), no we're not gonna stop when they hit the lights
(Oh, oh!), when the rest is wrong you're the one thing right
(Oh, oh!), when the music stops promise me that you won't let it go
We'll keep dancing 'til tomorrow, yeah, hey, oh (Oh!)

[Chorus: Nick]
(Oh, oh)
No, I never thought we'd come this far
(Oh, oh!)
Got enough for me to break my heart
(Oh, oh)
When the music stops
Promise me that you won't let it go
Keep dancing 'til tomorrow
(Oh, oh)
No, we're not gonna stop when they hit the lights
(Oh, oh!)
When the rhythm is gone, do the one thing right
(Oh, oh)
When the music stops, promise me that you won't let it go
We'll keep dancing 'til tomorrow

[Outro: Nick]
Keep dancing 'til tomorrow
(Oh, oh)
No, we're not gonna stop
When they hit the lights
(Oh, oh!)
When the rest is wrong you're the one thing right
(Oh, oh)
When the music stops
Promise me that you won't let it go
We'll keep dancing 'til tomorrow
